Package main.body

Class Stadium

java.lang.Object
main.body.Stadium
public class Stadium extends Object
This class implements a Stadium. From here the player can view and play possible matches It will also show the player the current standings of the league. It will also check to see if the player can play a match. From the stadium the player can also take a bye.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stadium

      public Stadium(GameManager manager, Team playerTeam)
      This method is used to initialize the stadium. It generates the NPC teams and sets the possible matches.
      Parameters:
      manager - The GameManager that is being used.
      playerTeam - The team that the player is using.

    • updateMatchPoints

      public void updateMatchPoints(Match playedMatch)
      This method is used to update the points of the other teams. Gives a random amount of points to the other teams.
      Parameters:
      playedMatch - The match that was played.
